TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SchemeSettingElement extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement

Docs.summary: Represents an element in a class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection> class represents the \<schemeSettings> element under the Uri section within a configuration file. The SchemeSettingElement class represents an instance of an element in the <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection> class.
The <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElementCollection> class and the \<schemeSettings> section in a configuration file looks generic, implying that an application can specify any <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions?displayProperty=fullName> enumeration value for any scheme. In fact, only the <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions?displayProperty=fullName> flag for HTTP and HTTPS schemes are supported. All other settings are ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the value of the GenericUriParserOptions entry from a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The GenericUriParserOptions property returns a <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions?displayProperty=fullName> enumeration value for the <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement> instance.

Docs.summary: Gets the value of the Name entry from a instance.
Docs.value: The protocol used by this schema setting.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement.GenericUriParserOptions%2A> property returns a <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions?displayProperty=fullName> enumeration value for the <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement> instance.
The <xref:System.Configuration.SchemeSettingElement.GenericUriParserOptions%2A> element is currently restricted to HTPP and HTTPS.

Docs.returns: The protocol used by this schema setting.
